          <title>
            <string language="en">Ultrasound scanning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschallabtastung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture d'ultrasons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exploração do ultrasound</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esame di ultrasuono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανίχνευση υπερήχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exploración del ultrasonido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how some ultrasounds are reflected as echoes when ultrasounds cross from one substance into another.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">echoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal casting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound generators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound scanning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie einige Ultraschall als
Echos reflektiert werden, wenn Ultraschall von einer Substanz in 
andere kreuzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment quelques ultrasons 
sont reflétés comme échos quand les ultrasons croisent d'une 
substance dans des autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como alguns ultrasounds 
estão refletidos como ecos quando os ultrasounds se cruzam de uma 
substância em outra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come alcuni ultrasuoni sono 
riflessi come echi quando gli ultrasuoni attraversano da una sostanza 
in un altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς μερικοί υπέρηχοι 
απεικονίζονται ως ηχώ όταν διασχίζουν οι υπέρηχοι από μια ουσία
σε άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo algunos ultrasonidos 
se reflejan como generaciones de eco cuando los ultrasonidos se cruzan
a partir de una sustancia en otra.</string>
          </description>
